data.metadata:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<EntityDescriptor entityID="http://hmcts-idam-fr.northeurope.cloudapp.azure.com:8080/openam" xmlns="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:metadata">
    <SPSSODescriptor AuthnRequestsSigned="false" WantAssertionsSigned="false" protocolSupportEnumeration="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:protocol">
        <KeyDescriptor use="signing">
            <ds:KeyInfo xmlns:ds="http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#">
                <ds:X509Data>
                    <ds:X509Certificate></ds:X509Certificate>
                </ds:X509Data>
            </ds:KeyInfo>
        </KeyDescriptor>
        <SingleLogoutService Binding="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:bindings:HTTP-Redirect" Location="http://hmcts-idam-fr.northeurope.cloudapp.azure.com:8080/openam/SPSloRedirect/metaAlias/hmcts/sp" ResponseLocation="http://hmcts-idam-fr.northeurope.cloudapp.azure.com:8080/openam/SPSloRedirect/metaAlias/hmcts/sp"/>
        <SingleLogoutService Binding="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:bindings:HTTP-POST" Location="http://hmcts-idam-fr.northeurope.cloudapp.azure.com:8080/openam/SPSloPOST/metaAlias/hmcts/sp" ResponseLocation="http://hmcts-idam-fr.northeurope.cloudapp.azure.com:8080/openam/SPSloPOST/metaAlias/hmcts/sp"/>
        <SingleLogoutService Binding="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:bindings:SOAP" Location="http://hmcts-idam-fr.northeurope.cloudapp.azure.com:8080/openam/SPSloSoap/metaAlias/hmcts/sp"/>
        <ManageNameIDService Binding="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:bindings:HTTP-Redirect" Location="http://hmcts-idam-fr.northeurope.cloudapp.azure.com:8080/openam/SPMniRedirect/metaAlias/hmcts/sp" ResponseLocation="http://hmcts-idam-fr.northeurope.cloudapp.azure.com:8080/openam/SPMniRedirect/metaAlias/hmcts/sp"/>
        <ManageNameIDService Binding="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:bindings:HTTP-POST" Location="http://hmcts-idam-fr.northeurope.cloudapp.azure.com:8080/openam/SPMniPOST/metaAlias/hmcts/sp" ResponseLocation="http://hmcts-idam-fr.northeurope.cloudapp.azure.com:8080/openam/SPMniPOST/metaAlias/hmcts/sp"/>
        <ManageNameIDService Binding="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:bindings:SOAP" Location="http://hmcts-idam-fr.northeurope.cloudapp.azure.com:8080/openam/SPMniSoap/metaAlias/hmcts/sp" ResponseLocation="http://hmcts-idam-fr.northeurope.cloudapp.azure.com:8080/openam/SPMniSoap/metaAlias/hmcts/sp"/>
        <NameIDFormat>urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:nameid-format:transient</NameIDFormat>
        <AssertionConsumerService index="0" isDefault="true" Binding="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:bindings:HTTP-Artifact" Location="http://hmcts-idam-fr.northeurope.cloudapp.azure.com:8080/openam/Consumer/metaAlias/hmcts/sp"/>
        <AssertionConsumerService index="1" Binding="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:bindings:HTTP-POST" Location="http://hmcts-idam-fr.northeurope.cloudapp.azure.com:8080/openam/Consumer/metaAlias/hmcts/sp"/>
        <AssertionConsumerService index="2" Binding="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:bindings:PAOS" Location="http://hmcts-idam-fr.northeurope.cloudapp.azure.com:8080/openam/Consumer/ECP/metaAlias/hmcts/sp"/>
    </SPSSODescriptor>
</EntityDescriptor>
data.entityConfig:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<EntityConfig entityID="http://hmcts-idam-fr.northeurope.cloudapp.azure.com:8080/openam" hosted="true" xmlns="urn:sun:fm:SAML:2.0:entityconfig">
    <SPSSOConfig metaAlias="/hmcts/sp">
        <Attribute name="wantLogoutResponseSigned">
            <Value>false</Value>
        </Attribute>
        <Attribute name="wantAttributeEncrypted">
            <Value>false</Value>
        </Attribute>
        <Attribute name="spAuthncontextMapper">
            <Value>com.sun.identity.saml2.plugins.DefaultSPAuthnContextMapper</Value>
        </Attribute>
        <Attribute name="alwaysIdpProxy"/>
        <Attribute name="autofedAttribute">
            <Value/>
        </Attribute>
        <Attribute name="spSessionSyncEnabled">
            <Value>false</Value>
        </Attribute>
        <Attribute name="spAuthncontextComparisonType">
            <Value>exact</Value>
        </Attribute>
        <Attribute name="idpProxyList">
            <Value/>
        </Attribute>
        <Attribute name="spDoNotWriteFederationInfo">
            <Value>false</Value>
        </Attribute>
        <Attribute name="wantPOSTResponseSigned">
            <Value>false</Value>
        </Attribute>
        <Attribute name="localAuthURL">
            <Value/>
        </Attribute>
        <Attribute name="wantMNIRequestSigned">
            <Value>false</Value>
        </Attribute>
        <Attribute name="spAdapterEnv">
            <Value/>
        </Attribute>
        <Attribute name="basicAuthPassword"/>
        <Attribute name="transientUser">
            <Value/>
        </Attribute>
        <Attribute name="cotlist">
            <Value>reform_verify</Value>
        </Attribute>
        <Attribute name="spAttributeMapper">
            <Value>com.sun.identity.saml2.plugins.DefaultSPAttributeMapper</Value>
        </Attribute>
        <Attribute name="saeSPUrl">
            <Value>http://hmcts-idam-fr.northeurope.cloudapp.azure.com:8080/openam/spsaehandler/metaAlias/hmcts/sp</Value>
        </Attribute>
        <Attribute name="responseArtifactMessageEncoding">
            <Value>URI</Value>
        </Attribute>
        <Attribute name="useNameIDAsSPUserID">
            <Value>false</Value>
        </Attribute>
        <Attribute name="wantAssertionEncrypted">
            <Value>false</Value>
        </Attribute>
        <Attribute name="saml2AuthModuleName">
            <Value/>
        </Attribute>
        <Attribute name="relayStateUrlList"/>
        <Attribute name="appLogoutUrl">
            <Value/>
        </Attribute>
        <Attribute name="useIntroductionForIDPProxy">
            <Value>false</Value>
        </Attribute>
        <Attribute name="ECPRequestIDPListGetComplete">
            <Value/>
        </Attribute>
        <Attribute name="attributeMap">
            <Value>*=*</Value>
        </Attribute>
        <Attribute name="spAuthncontextClassrefMapping">
            <Value>urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:ac:classes:PasswordProtectedTransport|0|default</Value>
        </Attribute>
        <Attribute name="wantMNIResponseSigned">
            <Value>false</Value>
        </Attribute>
        <Attribute name="wantLogoutRequestSigned">
            <Value>false</Value>
        </Attribute>
        <Attribute name="metaAlias"/>
        <Attribute name="ECPRequestIDPListFinderImpl">
            <Value>com.sun.identity.saml2.plugins.ECPIDPFinder</Value>
        </Attribute>
        <Attribute name="spAccountMapper">
            <Value>com.sun.identity.saml2.plugins.DefaultSPAccountMapper</Value>
        </Attribute>
        <Attribute name="includeRequestedAuthnContext">
            <Value>true</Value>
        </Attribute>
        <Attribute name="spAdapter">
            <Value/>
        </Attribute>
        <Attribute name="ECPRequestIDPList">
            <Value/>
        </Attribute>
        <Attribute name="saeAppSecretList"/>
        <Attribute name="idpProxyCount">
            <Value>0</Value>
        </Attribute>
        <Attribute name="wantArtifactResponseSigned">
            <Value>false</Value>
        </Attribute>
        <Attribute name="basicAuthOn">
            <Value>false</Value>
        </Attribute>
        <Attribute name="wantNameIDEncrypted">
            <Value>false</Value>
        </Attribute>
        <Attribute name="basicAuthUser"/>
        <Attribute name="saeSPLogoutUrl"/>
        <Attribute name="intermediateUrl">
            <Value/>
        </Attribute>
        <Attribute name="useIDPFinder"/>
        <Attribute name="defaultRelayState">
            <Value/>
        </Attribute>
        <Attribute name="assertionTimeSkew">
            <Value>300</Value>
        </Attribute>
        <Attribute name="autofedEnabled">
            <Value>false</Value>
        </Attribute>
        <Attribute name="enableIDPProxy">
            <Value>false</Value>
        </Attribute>
        <Attribute name="signingCertAlias">
            <Value>test</Value>
        </Attribute>
    </SPSSOConfig>
</EntityConfig>
